terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: Xijing Digestive Proteomics Core, Four Military Medical University, China

description: some of enriched proteins are involved in cellular processes that are widely recognized as important for aging. Livers of ageing mice exhibited changed methylation, loss of proteostasis (protein folding alteration, decreased autophagy, and increased ubiquitination), increased apoptosis, dysregulated rhythmic process, and gut dysbiosis.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: ageing-associated NAFLD, proteomics, AIMP2,PARP1, OGT, O-GlcNAcylation

title: OGT-mediated AIMP2 O-GlcNAcylation promotes PARP1 overactivation in ageing-associated liver steatosis
